title: Avengers: The Initiative, Vol. 1: Basic Training
description: The Civil War is over, and from now on, this is the new face of the Marvel Universeâ€”The Initiative.Whose side were you on? If you were pro-registration, then there's one hell of a price to pay: you're in the army now. Fall in with Yellowjacket, War Machine, She-Hulk, Justice and The Gauntlet as they train the heroes of tomorrow for the super-powered conflicts of today Marvel's army of super heroes has just become a super hero army.Also featuring The Mighty Avengers and a new generation of Marvels.Collecting: Avengers: The Initiative 1-6
author: Dan Slott
